light source: The light source used in the experiment is a 500 W halogen lamp (Everbright; H-500; 143 mW/cm²; wavelength range 4500-900 nm).
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment is a 500 W halogen lamp (Everbright; H-500; 143 mW/cm²; l14500-900 nm).
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is a 0.2 M potassium bicarbonate solution.
